PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZclCommandOptions_t Struct Reference

A type for setting options of a ZCL cluster's command. More...

#include <clusters.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t direction:1
 Direction: etiher ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DIRECTION_CLIENT_TO_SERVER or ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DIRECTION_SERVER_TO_CLIENT.
uint8_t defaultResponse:1
 Should be ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_ENABLE_DEFAULT_RESPONSE if the ZCL default response is required and ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DISABLE_DEFAULT_RESPONSE if not.
uint8_t waitingResponse:2
 Should be ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE if there is other relevant response specified for the command and ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE otherwise.
uint8_t ackRequest:1
 Specifies if APS ACK if requested for the command.
uint8_t reserved:3
 Reserved for future use.

Detailed Description

A type for setting options of a ZCL cluster's command.
